amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out several Federal agency programs and apply the $3,481,616,000 in savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the accounts for Plant or Facility Acquisition, Construction, or Expansion of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Programs to $0 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 339 (Roll no. 244).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 80 - 339 (Roll no. 244).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Buck.
